Add one or more columns. The order influ: Add one or more columns. The order influences how columns overlay one another: the first column (from the top) is drawn lowest and other columns are drawn on top of it.
Data points for a single column.
Data points for all columns which will b: Data points for all columns which will be divided into single columns based on the Group by attribute value.
Data points within the same group form o: Data points within the same group form one column.
The column name displayed in the legend.
Defines how data is aggregated when mult: Defines how data is aggregated when multiple Y values are available for a single X value
Percentage: portion of parent size. Pixe: Percentage: portion of parent size. Pixels: absolute amount of pixels.
